name: 3D SIMULATOR DESTRUCTION 2
description:
Hey! I present to your attention my game 3D Destruction 2!

Peculiarities:

- excellent destruction physics for browsers,

- 11 types of weapons (flare gun, machine gun, automatic cannon, blaster and more),

- 10 unique cards to choose from,

- slowing down time

- gravity control,

- first-person view
